description: A home for voices. A haven for hearts. SAAYA is back with another intimate all-women gathering—a space where poetry, music, stories, and op

location.address: 2117/25, 2nd Floor, CMR Main Rd, HRBR Layout 2nd Block, HRBR Layout, Kalyan Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560043, India

name: SAAYA - An Evening of Sisterhood & Stories

offers.description:
Hey my beautiful WOMAN, This isn’t just a ticket, it’s an invitation to belong. To step into a space where voices are cherished, stories are held gently, and silence is just as powerful as words. With this pass, you’re not just attending, you’re becoming a part of a circle where poetry flows like conversation, music feels like an embrace, and every story is met with warmth. Come as you are. Speak if you wish. Listen if you need. Let’s share the night together. Love, Twinkle Ann
